amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the local courts of the District of Columbia may consider cases relating to the Pledge of Allegiance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered one printed in House Report 108-693 to insert the following in section 1632 of title 28, United States Code, as added by section 2(a) of the bill: "The limitation in this section shall not apply to the Superior Court of the District of Columbia or the District of Columbia Court of Appeals.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
